---
title: PlistApi.plist_dict_get_item_key method
---

Get key associated key to an item. Item must be member of a dictionary.

```csharp
public virtual void plist_dict_get_item_key(PlistHandle node, out string key)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the item |
| key | a location to store the key. The caller is responsible for freeing the returned string. |
